metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0183 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
multipart/parser.rb in Rack 1.3.x before 1.3.8 and 1.4.x before 1.4.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and out-of-memory error) via a long string in a Multipart HTTP packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librack-ruby - 1.5.2-1
librack-ruby1.8 - 1.5.2-1
librack-ruby1.9.1 - 1.5.2-1
ruby-rack - 1.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1').
